title: Chocolate
name: Chocolate
description:
A Map by Choconancy

Great chocolate places in the world

properties.name: Bonbon Atelier Janson
properties.description: Posted by DorineruterIf you love chocolate and live or stay in the Netherlands, you HAVE to visit Janson in Zutphen. You can buy at the store (where you sit in the livingroom and watch Janson make the chocolates), order chocolate online, participate in a workshop (public demo or with your own group) or buy the DVD on how to make chocolates. Janson is also organizor of the Chocolate Festival Zutphen, this year 2006 it\'s on Sept 18. I wish I lived in Zutphen!

properties.name: Boule
properties.description: Posted by Cryztalvisions 420 North La Cienega BLVD, Los Angeles, CA 90048Fabulous delectable chocolate creations that are almost too pretty too eat. Exquisite tastes, friendly people, who could ask for more? Wonderful gifts for the chocolate lover in your life, Boule packages their scrumptious morsels in simple and beautifully elegant way. Joan Collins has been seen buying treats here. Don\'t miss their delicious sorbets and ice cream. Local pickup and delivery available as well as online shopping.

properties.name: Chocolate Bar
properties.description: Posted by Spoetzl48 8th Ave, New York, NY A big dollop of peanut butter turns the classic hot chocolate into a sweet and salty treat.

properties.name: Chocolati Greenlake
properties.description: Posted by Johndoe

properties.name: City Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Builttospill3 W 18th St, New York, NY Owner Maury Rubin creates an original hot chocolate every day during February, but you can have the excellent original recipe anytime. Home-made marshmallows!

properties.name: Donnelley's Chocolates
properties.description: Posted by Cryztalvisions1509 Mission St. Santa Cruz CA 95060Since 1988, Donnelly chocolate has been made by hand from the finest French and Belgian couvertures. After studying with master chocolatiers in Paris and Brussels, Richard Donnelly returned to the United States to create his own line of chocolates, focusing on simple yet sophisticated flavors. Chocolate Lover\'s Heaven!

properties.description: Posted by Eszter Chococlate store/cafe; the fondue is a great treat for a small group

properties.name: La Maison du Chocolat - Madison Ave
properties.description: Posted by System1018 Madison Ave, New York, NYIts the priciest cup, but the bittersweet Caracas just might be the richest and most deeply chocolatey. (NYNewsday)

properties.name: La Rue du Chocolat
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 448 South Coast Highway, Suite B, Laguna Beach, California 92651Charming shop with chocolate-dipped strawberries, truffles, handmade confections and other fine candies. Special gifts and custom chocolate boxes available. Next to the pepper tree in historic Peppertree Lane.

properties.name: Rogers Chocolates
properties.description: Posted by Cryztalvisions Scrumptious treats. Found in Victoria, Banff, Whistler, Vancouver and Granville Island. They ship worldwide through their website too. The Fire Bar is a must try for those who like spicey hot flavor expertly blended with dark luscious chocolate.

properties.name: chocolate & wine!
properties.description: Posted by Leibhartdavid medlow chocolates is next to a conference centre (or was it a hotel?) in the McLauren Vale area. they do some amazing chocolate with wine centres! the shiraz and dark chocolate was my fav. they also have a whole line of jelly type candies which are veggie friendly (using pectin, not gelatine). located at: McLarens on the Lake, Kangarilla Road McLaren Vale SA 5171 Phone: 08 8323 8818 Fax: 08 323 9896 Other: 0411 780 236
